programme.title: Bitesize Tennis Classics
programme.desc: In a rematch of the 2023 Madrid Open final, world number one Iga Swiatek and defending champion Aryna Sabalenka meet again to determine this year's women's singles champion. (04.05)

programme.title: Tennis Highlights

programme.title: Live ATP Final: Stuttgart
programme.desc: In a blockbuster Stuttgart final, world number three Alexander Zverev competes for a maiden grass-court title on home soil against second seed Taylor Fritz, who leads the head to head 7-5.

programme.title: Live: ATP s'Hertogenbosch Final
programme.desc: Zizou Bergs and Gabriel Diallo each get a second shot at ATP Tour glory in the 's-Hertogenbosch final. Diallo overcame Bergs in their only prior meeting earlier this year in Madrid.
